game.name: Hostile Waters: Antaeus Rising
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: In 2032 an Earth that knows only peace is forced to relearn the art of war. Twenty years have passed since the population of Earth did a fine job of destroying nearly everything in one final struggle for power by the politicians and military leaders.

reviewHighlights.text: One of my favorite games to this day, used to play it a lot during my childhood, 10/10 will forever hope for a remake/remaster
